subject: Islamic State-Taliban conflict
object: 2 February 2015 - present | (7 years, 1 month and 3 days)

subject: Islamic State-Taliban conflict
object: Ongoing | Initial Taliban victories in the battles of Darzab and Nangarhar | Collapse of the Islamic State stronghold in eastern Afghanistan in 2019 | IS-KP regains strength in 2021, retaking territory in eastern Afghanistan

subject: Belligerents
predicate: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan | Taliban | Haqqani network | Al-Qaeda | Islamic Movement of Uzbekistan | (pro-Taliban & anti-IS factions) | Hezb-e-Islami Gulbuddin | Supported by | United States | (limited) | Iran | (allegedly) | Pakistan | (allegedly) | Russia | (allegedly)
object: Islamic State | Khorasan Province | IS central command | Mullah Dadullah Front | Fidai Mahaz | High Council of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan | (HCIEA) | Supported by | Islamic Republic of Afghanistan | (allegedly, until 2021)

subject: Units involved
object: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan forces | Islamic Emirate Army | Red Unit | General Directorate of Intelligence | Pro-Taliban militias | Islamic State - Khorasan Province forces | Islamic Movement of Uzbekistan | (pro-IS factions) | Taliban defectors | Former Afghan soldiers | (2021-) | Former Afghan intelligence agency personnel | (2021-)

subject: Strength
object: Khorasan Province and its allies | 1,000-8,500 fighters (2016) | 2,000-3,500 fighters (2021) | HCIEA | 3,000-3,500
